languages.text: {n}Заметив {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_EklendylSaved}Эклендиля{/d}, Муаран вздрагивает, а затем церемонно произносит:{/n} "Собрат Эклендиль, я славлю Азуриана за счастье вновь лицезреть тебя. Прошу, отступи под мою защиту не медля".
languages.translation_comment: если игрок сбежал из Комморры с фарсиром Эклендилем

languages.text: {n}Upon noticing {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_EklendylSaved}Eklendyl{/d}, Muaran flinches, then says solemnly,{/n} "Brother Eklendyl, I praise Asuryan for the fortune of seeing you again. Please, step under my protection without delay."
languages.original_text: {n}Заметив {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_EklendylSaved}Эклендиля{/d}, Муаран вздрагивает, а затем церемонно произносит:{/n} "Собрат Эклендиль, я славлю Азуриана за счастье вновь лицезреть тебя. Прошу, отступи под мою защиту не медля".

traits.locale_text: {n}Upon noticing Eklendyl, Muaran flinches, then says solemnly,{/n} "Brother Eklendyl, I praise Asuryan for the fortune of seeing you again. Please, step under my protection without delay."
{n}Upon noticing Eklendyl, Muaran flinches, then says solemnly,{/n} "Brother Eklendyl, I praise Asuryan for the fortune of seeing you again. Please, step under my protection without delay."

{n}Upon noticing {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_EklendylSaved}Eklendyl{/d}, Muaran flinches, then says solemnly,{/n} "Brother Eklendyl, I praise Asuryan for the fortune of seeing you again. Please, step under my protection without delay."

{n}Upon noticing {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_EklendylSaved}Eklendyl{/d}, Muaran flinches, then says solemnly,{/n} "Brother Eklendyl, I praise Asuryan for the fortune of seeing you again. Please, step under my protection without delay."

languages.text: {n}穆兰注意到{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_EklendylSaved}埃克伦迪{/d}之后，突然退缩了一下，随后以庄严的声音开了口。{/n}“埃克伦迪兄弟，赞美阿苏焉，我又有幸与你见面。请你立刻接受我的保护吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}Upon noticing {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_EklendylSaved}Eklendyl{/d}, Muaran flinches, then says solemnly,{/n} "Brother Eklendyl, I praise Asuryan for the fortune of seeing you again. Please, step under my protection without delay."

traits.locale_text: {n}穆兰注意到埃克伦迪之后，突然退缩了一下，随后以庄严的声音开了口。{/n}“埃克伦迪兄弟，赞美阿苏焉，我又有幸见到你了。请你立刻接受我的保护吧。”

languages.text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_EklendylSaved}エクレンディル{/d}の存在に気が付いた瞬間、ムアランは戸惑い、厳かに言った。{/n} 「エクレンディル兄弟よ、あなたに再会できたことを、アスリヤンに感謝する。躊躇なく遅滞なく私の保護下に入ってくれ」
languages.original_text: {n}Upon noticing {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_EklendylSaved}Eklendyl{/d}, Muaran flinches, then says solemnly,{/n} "Brother Eklendyl, I praise Asuryan for the fortune of seeing you again. Please, step under my protection without delay."

traits.locale_text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_EklendylSaved}エクレンディル{/d}の存在に気が付いた瞬間、ムアランは戸惑い、厳かに言った。{/n} 「エクレンディル兄弟よ、あなたに再会できたことを、アスリヤンに感謝する。躊躇なく遅滞なく私の保護下に入ってくれ」

languages.text: {n}Al fijarse en {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_EklendylSaved}Eklendyl{/d}, Muaran se sorprende y declara solemnemente:{/n} «Hermano Eklendyl, doy gracias a Asuryan por poder verte otra vez. Por favor, acógete a mi protección inmediatamente».
languages.original_text: {n}Upon noticing {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_EklendylSaved}Eklendyl{/d}, Muaran flinches, then says solemnly,{/n} "Brother Eklendyl, I praise Asuryan for the fortune of seeing you again. Please, step under my protection without delay."

traits.locale_text: {n}Al fijarse en Eklendyl, Muaran se sorprende y declara solemnemente:{/n} «Hermano Eklendyl, doy gracias a Asuryan por poder verte otra vez. Por favor, acógete a mi protección inmediatamente».

languages.text: {n}Muaran zuckt zusammen, als er {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_EklendylSaved}Eklendyl{/d} sieht, dann sagt er feierlich:{/n} "Bruder Eklendyl, ich preise Asuryan für das Glück, Euch wiederzusehen. Bitte tretet ohne Zögern unter meinen Schutz."
languages.original_text: {n}Upon noticing {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_EklendylSaved}Eklendyl{/d}, Muaran flinches, then says solemnly,{/n} "Brother Eklendyl, I praise Asuryan for the fortune of seeing you again. Please, step under my protection without delay."

traits.locale_text: {n}Muaran zuckt zusammen, als er Eklendyl sieht, dann sagt er feierlich:{/n} "Bruder Eklendyl, ich preise Asuryan für das Glück, Euch wiederzusehen. Bitte tretet ohne Zögern unter meinen Schutz."
{n}Muaran zuckt zusammen, als er Eklendyl sieht, dann sagt er feierlich:{/n} "Bruder Eklendyl, ich preise Asuryan für das Glück, Euch wiederzusehen. Bitte tretet ohne Zögern unter meinen Schutz."

languages.text: {n}Remarquant la présence d'{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_EklendylSaved}Eklendyl{/d}, Muaran tressaille.{/n} « Frère Eklendyl, {n}dit-il sur un ton solennel,{/n} je remercie Asuryan de m'avoir donné la chance de vous revoir. Je vous prie de vous mettre sans délai sous ma protection. »
languages.original_text: {n}Upon noticing {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_EklendylSaved}Eklendyl{/d}, Muaran flinches, then says solemnly,{/n} "Brother Eklendyl, I praise Asuryan for the fortune of seeing you again. Please, step under my protection without delay."

traits.locale_text: {n}Remarquant la présence d'Eklendyl, Muaran tressaille.{/n} « Frère Eklendyl, {n}dit-il sur un ton solennel,{/n} je remercie Asuryan de m'avoir donné la chance de vous revoir. Je vous prie de vous mettre sans délai sous ma protection. »

{n}Remarquant la présence d'Eklendyl, Muaran tressaille.{/n} « Frère Eklendyl, {n}dit-il sur un ton solennel,{/n} je remercie Asuryan de m'avoir donné la chance de vous revoir. Je vous prie de vous mettre sans délai sous ma protection. »

languages.text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_EklendylSaved}Eklendyl'i{/d} fark eden Muaran, irkilip ardından sakince konuşuyor.{/n} "Kardeşim Eklendyl... Seni yeniden görme şansına eriştim ya, Asuryan'a şükürler olsun. Buyur, hemen himayeme gir."
languages.original_text: {n}Upon noticing {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_EklendylSaved}Eklendyl{/d}, Muaran flinches, then says solemnly,{/n} "Brother Eklendyl, I praise Asuryan for the fortune of seeing you again. Please, step under my protection without delay."

traits.locale_text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_EklendylSaved}Eklendyl{/d}'i fark eden Muaran irkiliyor. Ardından sakince konuşuyor,{/n} "Kardeşim Eklendyl... Seni yeniden görme şansına eriştim ya, Asuryan'a şükürler olsun. Buyur, hemen himayem altına gir."

languages.translation_comment: если игрок сбежал из Комморры с фарсиром Эклендилем
